summary: Mithril light armor for male and female
descriptionHtml:
Hi everyone, I have finally gone back and finished my first project, Mithril armor! :D I have strongly used oblivions Mithril armor as an inspiration and have tried to replicate it as much as possible but still tried to give it a new look for skyrim. I have made all the assets or adapted Skyrims ones so please don\'t accuse me of stealing as it took me ages to get certain parts as close as possible! :). But I suppose it would be a compliment if you did ;)
If you like this mod then why not check out my other mods \"KNIGHTS OF THE NINE\" and \"MATYS MEDIEVAL KNIGHTS\".

DETAILS
-Mithril light armor for male and female (argonian and Khajiit not compatible but might include at a later date).
-Can be forged if you have the glass smithing perk and is found under Misc
-Is about the same stats as dragon scale

Errors
- If you find any errors please let me know

Donators.
A huge thank you to users that have decided to make a donation. It is really appreciated. Thanks!
- FelxcolossiCXx 
- Tfig2110

Permissions
- At the moment my assets are exclusive and will be untill I can complete all the things I want to do for this mod later on in the year. Translation conversions are fine, just credit me. Thanks
[youtube]OtEemcdHHTo[/youtube]
author: Maty743
